links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) ~ (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1) / r^n, where r = 0.5313908566521572046202664406047153136830749994... is the root of the equation exp(-r) = tan(r). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
